features:
Stretchy rib-knit waist for excellent fit.
Waist designed to be as flat as possible, for use with harness.
Adjustable draw cord inside waistband.
Fly with button and Velcro closure.
Two open pockets in front.
Two open back pockets, bonded for greater comfort when using harness.
Small zippered pocket on right leg.
Buttons and buttonholes to shorten the pant to 3/4 length.
Brush loop on side.
Fit: Regular
Weight:276gr
